name: The Block
title: Utf8b8jutw Cboe Bzx Files To List And Trade
text:
Synopsis
The cryptocurrency market is experiencing increased institutional interest and regulatory movement, with multiple spot crypto ETF filings and strategic investments signaling growing mainstream adoption.

Key Insights
- Cboe BZX Exchange filed 19b-4 forms to list and trade spot XRP ETFs for Bitwise, 21Shares, and Canary Capital
- BlackRock increased its ownership stake in MicroStrategy (Strategy) from 4.09% to 5%, now holding 11.26 million shares valued at over $3.7 billion
- CleanSpark reported $162.3 million Q4 revenue, with a bitcoin mining cost of approximately $34,000 per bitcoin
- VanEck predicts Solana could reach $520 with a $250 billion market cap by end of 2025, projecting a 165% price gain
- The SEC is advancing discussions on multiple crypto ETFs, including Grayscale's Litecoin and Solana ETF proposals
- The CFTC plans to hold a CEO Forum to discuss a digital asset markets pilot program, involving major crypto companies like Coinbase, Circle, and Ripple
